page.title: 13 DANCING
page.content: Lots of girls in our school like to go dancing.There are three dancing schools.We can choose from tap,ballet, acrobatics or modern.We can take exams in each of these to get to a higher grade.Sometimes we have a concert when our parents,local people and visitors come to see us.Our mums usually make our costumes but if they are very difficult to do we take them to a dressmaker.We do shows in nearby vill- ages and go to other towns to take part in competitions with dancing schools from different areas.It is good fun at Christmas because we do a pantomime.Last year we did Dick Whitt- ington with adult singers,dancers,act- ors and actresses.Our dancing teachers husband made the scenery.Before the performance,we feel very scared but when we are on stage we feel very proud of ourselves.
